website_summaries.verdict: An affordable volcanic clay mask that clears congestion without being too harsh or drying.
pros: Thick clay mask that deep-cleans the skin with volcanic lava clusters and lactic acid
Helps minimize pores and exfoliates to leave skin clearer and softer
Gentle enough for sensitive skin and dry skin
cons: Consistency makes it hard to wash off

website_summaries.verdict: Korean skincare is popular for a reason – this mask is firm yet gentle, and suitable for many skin types.
pros: The Innisfree mask is sourced from volcanic ash to tighten pores, removes sebum and exfoliates
The mask doesn't dry too hard or tight, and rinses off easily
Works in a skincare routine or as a pimple spot treatment
cons: It's only a 5-ounce jar, but a little clay goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: Is this magical or what?
customer_reviews.text: This mask is to die for. It has the same effect as GlamGlow Supermud and costs almost 9 times cheaper. Very effective on acne, clears up my skin from blemishes and leaves it feel fresh and squeaky clean. I'm the biggest fan of Korean cosmetics and this one is my holy grail from now on. Also, just a little of this mask goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: weird. cool(ing). works!
customer_reviews.text: Lately i’ve been fascinated by all things k-beauty and Jeju Island, so innisfree peaked my interest. What sold it for me is seeing photos of reviewers with black spots, which I thought were the blackheads being pulled out. So I bought it, and the item arrived in 3 days. It spreads evenly, looks like any other clay mask. Thos blackheads being pulled out? Turns out they are parts of the volcanic lava sediment bursting. Um...ok. But the cooling effect is LOVELY. Washes off like a regular clay mask. After patting my face dry, I look at my t-zone. Matte, but not dry & ashy. My blackheads are clear! And the cooling effect lingers. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AYS

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as diy face mask or other...
customer_reviews.text: I don't quite know if I would purchase again. I mainly use this for my nose and chin, it gets some stuff off, but there are better products out there or even DIY face masks that do a better job at clearing my pores than this. I will use the rest, but I will not be repurchasing this product...the price just isn't worth the results. I followed the instructions and used it on my whole face and also just on the areas I previously mentioned and saw very little change to my pores, and didn't really see much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Spidergirlx

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of innisfree and this lives up to my expectations. While i can’t say i am completely devoid of blackheads or pores, it definitely helps. My favorite thing about this mask is that it is not overly drying like others, and does not make my skin red or itchy; you can definitely use it more than once a week! The smell is light and it is comfortable to wear (unlike other brands that get dry and uncomfortable). A pot will last me a while but i definitely plan to purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E Quaintance

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but effective
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great and gentle face mask. It doesn't leave my skin red or irritated and when it dries it's not super tight. But it is very effective and I do feel my face is smoother and cleaner. A little goes a long way and it's easy to scoop out with a spoon, brush on, and build up as necessary. It's a bit easier to rinse off than other heavy masks I've tried, but it's still a bit of a process. The container is a bit small, I wish you got more product though it's no deterrent as it's not expensive and overall worth the price for as gentle and effective as it is.
customer_reviews.author: VFlower2011

customer_reviews.title: It is kinda annoying to rinse off and I wish it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin. The first couple times I used this, it irritated my skin a bit (I developed some small pimples). It also feels verrrrrry dry a few minutes after applying. When I use it now, I mainly just use it once a week to help reduce the appearance of sebaceous filaments on and around my nose so I only apply it on that area instead of all over and leave it on for about 10 minutes before rinsing. It is kinda annoying to rinse off and I wish it came with some kind of spatula/applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: favourite ten minute mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. I've found it doesn't have to go on very thick to still draw out gunk from the pores, so a little goes a long way. Take care washing this off -- our very old sink does not like the clay, so I have to rinse my face in a bowl to keep the clay from going down the drain. It's worth it, though. Baby soft skin, every time.
customer_reviews.author: Scholar of the Shire

customer_reviews.title: Recommend by heyitsfeiii
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after one of my favorite YouTubers recommended it. I used it the day it arrived and I love it! This small jar will last me a long time since I only need it on my nose and chin. It feels very nice. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I try to use this mask once or twice a week. It definitely makes my pores smaller and face smoother without drying it out. It's easy to apply, doesn't have a strong smell (just smells like clay to me), and washes off easy. I love how soft and clean my skin is after using it! The pot is small but it doesn't take much to cover your whole face. If you like face masks or want smaller pores, this is definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Diaz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: When I have a breakout or just irritated red skin I put this on and it calms my skin so much and makes my breakouts appear smaller. I love it! I have tried all of the Glam Glows and I still keep coming back to this. It's also so smooth and easy to apply. I hate the masks with clumps of stuff in them that make a mess (like the Glam Glow that has tea chunks in it).
customer_reviews.author: SharonT13

customer_reviews.title: Good clay mask!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good basic clay mask, but it wasn’t strong enough to clear my pores. For some reason, my skin is in better condition when I use the Elizavecca Bubble Clay Mask. I still enjoy using it though, because it has a few tiny solid parts in it that I can use to exfoliate my skin when I wash it off my face. It leaves my face feeling softer so that’s a plus. I might try the Aztec Indian healing clay mask next time since my skin needs something stronger, but this was a good one and much more convenient for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kris.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this Mask! my face breaks out and is oily and I needed a mask to help my face. I read reviews and decided to try this...I do like this mask- it goes on not as smooth, but not hard to smooth on face. It dries on face and I eave on for 20 min- my face feels nice after. it can be rinsed off easily with wet washcloth or in shower. I use it 2-3xs a week. I feel my face does better with breaking out when I use the mask at least 2xs a week.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleTurtleMama

customer_reviews.title: This bottle has lasted me over 3 months already! ...
customer_reviews.text: This bottle has lasted me over 3 months already! I use it as both an all over mask about once a week and also as a spot treatment when I have breakouts. I have sensitive oily/combo skin. I think it lasts longer for me since I have a beard and a smaller face as well (hehe). But overall I really notice a difference when using this clay mask. I cleanse and then use a toner lightly before I use the clay mask.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my eczema patches!!
customer_reviews.text: I looovvveeee this product!! It goes on cooling, which is great for my eczema patches. It also cleans out my pores without leaving my skin too stripped. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product to tighten pores!
customer_reviews.text: This product has really helped to improve my skin texture and pores! At first I was a bit unimpressed but I kept using along with a pore tightening face wash and have really seen great results! Mask dries quickly and easily, and a little goes a long way! My skin therapist even noticed how smooth my skin looked compared to usual and was really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Erika O.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. It leaves your skin feel fresh and smooth. I use it 2-3 times a week and have combination skin. I have always been more on the drier spectrum and this definitely does not dry out my skin. The only downside is that it is a pretty small container, I’m not entirely sure how long it would last. I will update if I can!
customer_reviews.author: Nam Phuong

customer_reviews.title: Great clay mask with a nice cooling sensation
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for about a month now and it works like other clay masks. It does great work with my pores and oily skin. I think the best part about it would be the lovely cooling effect it has.
customer_reviews.author: Bojangols

customer_reviews.title: Best clay mask I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this mask! It doesn’t burn at all for me, though my skin is not terribly sensitive. It has a really nice cooling sensation while it’s on, and works WONDERS to unclog my pores without drying out my skin (combo skin... if you know, you know). I really can’t recommend this enough. From the packaging to the results, in my opinion this stuff is luxury skincare at a lower price point.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: It work great when i have breakout
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd of using this product and it works great for me. I usually use it twice a week and that reduces the amount of oil on my face and close pore a lot. When I have a breakout, I put it on my face for 45 min then wash off and then put on a moisturizer sheet mask. That makes all the acne reduce the redness and leave my skin feel soft. Anyways, really recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rein

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mask. I use it weekly. It clears my pores and keeps my skin so soft. It doesn't have any scent to speak of and wants of easily. It lasts a good long while, even with weekly use. I will continue to order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling soft.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mask. It tingles as it dries and leaves my skin feeling soft once it's removed. Down side it's hard to rinse off, you could use a wash cloth to get it off, but it's still time consuming. By the way, the directions on back are in Korean.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: I Like It!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! The first pic shows it still wet, the second pic shows it dry and ready for removal. It was dry for me in about fifteen minutes. I washed it off with luke warm water, as suggested and then carried on with my normal night time routine. It left my skin feeling supple and clean. There was a slight cooling feeling as it dried, but not tingly or abrasive. My skin isn’t too sensitive (occasional hormonal breakouts, no allergies), so I don’t know how to describe this, but it felt “right”.
customer_reviews.author: PukePants

customer_reviews.title: Best option if you can’t afford glam glow!
customer_reviews.text: Best glam glow mask replacement! It spreads easy, a little goes a long way! It doesn’t show each pore like the glam glow but honestly it feels the same when you wash it off in the end so I don’t think it’s worth paying $50 more for just that effect.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Dirbashi

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My skin always feels amazing the day after I use it. It takes about 20 minutes to dry and I recommend you use not a thin layer but a little thick of a layer in order to get a real effect. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I like this product a lot more than i thought i ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot more than i thought i would. Great for getting rid of filaments on the nose. I clean my skin with BHA (stridex in the red box), use this mask, and then massage my face with jojoba oil.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I Love Korean skin care and this was gentle but strong ...
customer_reviews.text: This product really well, I Love Korean skin care and this was gentle but strong I did notice my pores be less clogged and cleared up some acne, have only been using for a week but noticed my face have a very clean finish , over time I might have flawless skin because of this mask. Easy to use and works! Thought the formula would hurt more but it’s doesnt
customer_reviews.author: D-P

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: it’s great as it tightens up your pores and sucks out all the oils and dirt on your face. but remember not to use such masks on your face everyday as they may dry out your skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Lefam Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Okay clay mask
customer_reviews.text: The consistency is great, easy to apply on face, however it makes my skin super dry afterwards. I need to extra hydrate the skin after using it. Besides that i think it helps with my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Trucnguyen

customer_reviews.title: best clay mask
customer_reviews.text: best clay mask for tightening your pores. not much else to say here. has helped me clear up my skin quite a bit since using this, along with other innisfree products.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly awesome! I get very dry spots from my acne treatment, and use this 1x per week. Works wonders, and I have not have any reactions/sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Mask
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask so much! It does not have a strong smell and it get a little tingling feeling when you apply it. I only use this product 3 times a week. My skin has cleared up and my pores have minimize. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask, I am running low on it now so I will definitely be buyong a new one soon. I was worried when I bought this because I have really sensitive skin but I have had no issues with it all! 💖
customer_reviews.author: Darrien

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the great reviews. This feels very generic. Doesn’t even feel like clay. And it doesn’t do much. All the other masks I’ve used are much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: nicole polsinelli

customer_reviews.title: Does not match the picture
customer_reviews.text: So dissapointed. The product image is the super volcanic pore clay mask X2 while the actual product is the normal mask. It’s partly my fault for not reading closely, but if it’s the normal mask they should put a picture of the normal mask. They also don’t allow returns so I just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Chong

customer_reviews.title: too dry
customer_reviews.text: This Clay Mask is too dry for my skin. After I apply to my face, and wash it, I feel my face is wrinkled more! Too sad!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. My face feels so great after I use it. And my pores look smaller every time. A great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette colvard

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am always leary of new skincare, but this did not disappoint! It helps keep my t-zone oiliness in check and makes my pores look smaller. My makeup always goes on so nicely the morning after I do this mask. It spreads easily and doesn’t get too tight and stuff while drying. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: this works very well on all skin i know this cause I have daughters and they both have different skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail mask
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this mask - I'm officially loyal to Innisfree. The mask really helps with pore size, shine, and occasional breakouts. Believe the hype - this mask is phenomenal (and shipping was incredibly quick too - I signed up for 2 day shipping and got it the next day!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. I love that Innisfree uses better ingredients ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I love that Innisfree uses better ingredients as well. This mask is very cooling and it makes my skin feel so wonderful afterwards. It also makes pores feel a lot cleaner as well. And unlike a lot of Korean clay masks I've used, this one doesn't sting my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Yang

customer_reviews.title: It feels like going to the spa to get a facial
customer_reviews.text: This mask is so calming and gentle. It feels like going to the spa to get a facial. It makes my skin look clear, by pulling out ompurities, without leaving my skin feeling tight or dry. I love this mask and will certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen much of the effects on face. Will update if things start to improve.
customer_reviews.author: rmisasa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing product. I purchased it about 2 months ago, and ever since I received it my skin is almost 100% cleared of acne. Finally the first thing to work for my skin. Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Best clay mask in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several mask in the past year. One of them being the Glam Glow everyone talks about but I wasn't sold on that one because of how expensive it was and how it left my skin feeling afterwards. Felt like I had used chemicals on my face. This mask is amazing! Super moisturizing and my skin feels great! I've already used half the jar because I tend to use it twice a week! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this facemask so much. It feels amazing gliding on my face and after about 10 minutes my faces starts to feel a cooling effect. It does not make my face red and I almost swear I can feel it cleaning my pores out while it's on haha. This is my 2nd time purchasing this after receiving a sample in an Ipsy glambag a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Deitrick

customer_reviews.title: This product feels cool on your skin and calming
customer_reviews.text: This product feels cool on your skin and calming. After you take it off it leaves your skin super smooth and soft. The seller was great as well. A few samples came with it too. Overall a great experience and I would for sure buy this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality face mask, shrinks pores
customer_reviews.text: A lot of clay masks leave my face feeling very tight as it drys but this mask is a lot more gentle and doesn't leave my face red like some others have. It is very soft feeling, with very light grits that provides a gentle physical exfoliation when removing. I use this mask about once a week, especially before events when I want my skin to look fresh and clean/shrink my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: i feel that effectiveness should have been one of the categories for rating this product.
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff, it leaves the skin baby soft and bright without "bleaching". less breakouts, as well. very happy
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask on a whim and I absolutely love it! It makes my skin feel refreshed and soft. The best bit is that I can put it on right after I wax my brows and it eliminates any redness or possible pimples! Buy it, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: YAY!!
customer_reviews.text: Great! I received this mask as a sample from the company and I absolutely loved it! It wears down my big pimples so well after the night I apply it. I had to buy it after trying the sample. It's smaller than i thought though :((
customer_reviews.author: joshuahongs

customer_reviews.title: I just love it on my face whenever I apply it
customer_reviews.text: My twice a week clay mask, a must have, it's natural, I just love it on my face whenever I apply it. I will have to order another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Breeze

customer_reviews.title: used it longer
customer_reviews.text: haven't seen any results yet maybe I had to used it longer To see results
customer_reviews.author: Jessy73

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL🥰
customer_reviews.text: A must use&must have product! Helped treat and minimize my acne significantly! Can be used as a spot treatment overnight or a face mask(: I use this product twice a day, once in the morning and one time before I go to bed. Your makeup slides so smoothly after you wash it off and doesn’t leave your skin dry. I totally recommend this product!& will definitely be repurchasing 💕
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clay mask! Not overly drying on the skin and leaves your skin feeling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & John

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't wild about it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to do much, if anything, for my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Bahar Basaga

customer_reviews.title: Keeps acne at bay, makes skin super soft
customer_reviews.text: I really like this face mask; it's the best one I've tried, and I recommended it to my brother and 2 friends who started using it as well. They also claim it's the best mask they've ever used and it really helps with clearing acne. I use it twice a week for 15 mins and apply a glycolic acid toner right after. I haven't seen bad forehead acne for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya Sushkova

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this mask accidentally from a link on Rachel Zoe’s site regarding best amazon beauty products. It is awesome. Reasonably priced and works better than my Lancôme and Kiehl’s masks It said it was for oily skin on her link. I have dry skin and love it
customer_reviews.author: Roger D Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had a negative reaction to the facemask. Experienced a burning sensation and immediately rinsed it off. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: TSwift13

customer_reviews.title: BETTER than Glam Glow!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely blown away by how effective-yet-gentle this little mask truly is! And yes, I’ll say it: exponentially BETTER than the far pricier Glam Glow! It mattifies without drying and a thin layer is all you need. (Note: I have sensitive + combo skin with some eczema, so I only ever use these types of products on my t-zone. However! I don’t think putting this all over would do any harm. It’s THAT gentle)
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Raigoza

customer_reviews.title: Great product and feels delightful on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Feels great going on and has little gentle scrub particles that Feel delightful. I use it once a week and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Campion

customer_reviews.title: Best clay mask on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It really does a great job at clearing everything out of your skin. I have sensitive acne prone skin. I need see a difference after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Chenise Kuroiwa

customer_reviews.title: Great product for clay mask
customer_reviews.text: This clay mask is great after you cleanse your skin. It's great that it removes most of the dirt in the skin and gives your skin a nice smooth feel. Definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jaebeom Lee

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask and how my face feels after Will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to wash off and I don’t feel like it cleaned my pores. I like the mud mask from Kiehls more
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Lin

customer_reviews.title: mediocre
customer_reviews.text: mediocre mask. Didn't surprise at all. Honestly I didn't feel any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. Is is so helpful is getting rid of blackheads and reducing pores. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Holt

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders for minimizing the appearance of my blackheads without irritating my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Spiliakos

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! I had started using a new overnight ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I had started using a new overnight lotion for about a week and then I used this clay mask. A day after using it, my skin felt alot softer and I assumed it was the lotion I was using but then I realized it was the mask! It works wonderfully at exfoliating without leaving my skin completely stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Mayce

customer_reviews.title: it is amazing!! so I bought a jar for home
customer_reviews.text: I went to a spa and they used this on my face hands and feet. it is amazing!! so I bought a jar for home. I use it twice a week. removes black heads and white heads! love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa richardson

customer_reviews.title: An amazing clay mask
customer_reviews.text: This clay mask is really helpful for my skin. I love it so much. It really does exactly what they say about the product. My skin is extremely oily. It helps control the oil on my face. It also sucks a lot of blackhead and sebum out of my face, tones up my skin and tightened pore. It exfoliates too. It does so much for my skin. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie

customer_reviews.title: My face felt like it got a deep cleansing. Left my face feeling clean, fresh, and smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a mask to clean out the junk from my face. I work out a lot, and work in a bakery with flour everywhere, my face needs a deep cleansing! This stuff rocks. I even bought my friend one and she agrees! My face is pretty sensitive to products but this one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Really works! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle for me personally. After struggling with break outs and super oily sensitive skin all my life, this is the first thing I've found to make a real difference. After just three weeks I had a new face. I can't believe how well this works.
customer_reviews.author: liss

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Been using twice a week since July (2 mths) and nothing. By all means my face got worse.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Vee

customer_reviews.title: Smooth clear softness
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It has greatly improved my skin ‘s texture I can feel and see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Zenaida deleon

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly a well mask which clean the skin very well.
customer_reviews.text: The mask really cleans up my face. The acnes are less, and it feels good on my skin. The amount is little less than I thought it will, but it is actually useful. One of the best clay mask.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy wani

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad. After spread the clay, it have a minty cool feeling in face.
customer_reviews.author: Chue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to try this product but for some reason I just had the urge to buy and it was worth it! My pores are definitely less visible and the sebum control I was anticipating for did work. I also love the texture of this and the cooling effect, but a spoon provided would have been helpful so it's more sanitary. Overall, great product and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Soooo in love!
customer_reviews.text: This is the thickest clay mask Ive ever bought and I'm a true fan. I use it twice a week. Soooo in love!
customer_reviews.author: Molly F

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to your skin care toutine, instantly noticable results.
customer_reviews.author: Kodee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Pulls blackheads right out in a few minutes. Literally!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this mask. It clears up my pores and spreads like a dream. It goes on so smoothly and is satisfying to put on. One downfall to this item is that it takes a while to rinse off, although that might just be the case for most mud masks. Another thing about this mask is that a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Stacky Line

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried everything to get rid of the red blemishes and clogged pores on my nose and this stuff did the trick!! It also is insanely amazing at getting all that old dead skin out of your pores making them look fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: I like the cooling effect
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for weeks. Cooling effect is nice, not very hard to remove with warm water
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite clay masks out there. It works very well and my face feels nice and soft once I take it off.
customer_reviews.author: JillPill

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice and cool on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice and cool on your skin...not sure if it does anything for me other than calming my sensitive skin but I've only had it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product claim it will suck out all sebum and gunk in the pores but ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time i use this product. The next day always appear another small acne. This product claim it will suck out all sebum and gunk in the pores but i think to me it's opposite. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chau Mai

customer_reviews.title: Super Clay mask
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorites. Apply it and leave it on for 10 minutes, wash off. My skin tone is evened, my pores are tightened. My face looks clean and pure. A must have for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mask!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite masks. Feels cooling and refreshing. Truly digs impurities to the surface!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shadell Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect clay mask. It has a slight cooling effect which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen E. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Unsanitary, Need a Spatula or Brush, but Otherwise O.K.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle isn't that sanitary so you definitely need an applicator when applying it (don't use your fingers!) and if washed off incorrectly, it can cause pores to clog. I've used it twice now, and the first time was AMAZING, it reduced the inflammation of my acne and reduced the appearance of blackheads. However, upon the second usage, I actually ended up getting a pimple. Make sure you exfoliate after use to make sure you get all of the mask out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eveson

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and works wonder. There is no need to spend more than 20 bucks for any other brand. I did not do any scrub or any peel prior to do this. It left my skin super soft and pores did shrink. Will continue the regimen once a week, at most twice.
customer_reviews.author: P.lily

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel it doing anything to my skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel it doing anything to my skin and I'm not really seeing any results. I prefer a tingly feeling for a clarifying feel or a tightening feel to show my pores getting smaller but when I put this on I literally feel nothing happening.
customer_reviews.author: Lewisfacepalm

customer_reviews.title: The container is pretty small. I would say it lasts a while ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this and I didn't really see any difference in my skin. There was the same amount of black heads and it didn't really prevent forming acne. My sister tried it multiple times to see if it worked for her and it did not work. The container is pretty small. I would say it lasts a while even with using regularly, but I don't think it's worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I try to use it 2 times a week, i haven't seen any difference. Wish it was in a tube, i hate sticking my finger in it. I just use it with my 9 year old daughter now as a "spa" time with mommy now.
customer_reviews.author: chee

customer_reviews.title: 100% great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great to reduce pore size! I love using this mask
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty okay
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do much for the appearance of my skin but did improve the feel of it
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face mask I have ever purchased. I was originally interested in it for its claims of cleansing naturally yet gently, but my favorite thing is how it tightens the pores! I had one large pore on my nose, and after using this (even just once) there was a very noticeable size difference. It now looks like I am wearing a pore diminishing makeup, even when I am bare skined. It also cleansed both gently and without irratation which is great for someone with sensitive allery ridden skin like me. I know this product is pricey (especially on a college budget) but it is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Steckbeck

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality for Only Minimal Cost!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best facial mask that money can buy, yet, it is not costly! I LOVE Innisfree products, and intend to try each one, as well as, replenishing supplies of products that I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this mask caused my face to break out in little white pimples. If you have sensitive skin, I would advise against it. Also, you cannot return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Keidel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Really good product esp the price. Made my skin feel really clean afterwards. A bit difficult washing off but no biggie IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

product_meta.title: Innisfree Super Volcanic Pore Clay Mask, 3.38 Ounce
product_meta.description: Innisfree Super Volcanic Pore Clay Mask contains super volcanic cluster capsules, which powerfully adsorbs sebum to intensively resolve pore concerns.
feature_bullets: This new formula is infused with double the amount of Volcanic Ash of that of the original version, especially suitable for oily skin
Innisfree Super Volcanic Pore Clay Mask combines 5-in-1
functions: Tightens pores, Removes sebum, Exfoliates dead skin cells
Enhances skin tone, Provides cooling effects
